block_comment: This block of code functions as an edge-triggered timing check for a specific bit of the 'dqs_in' signal. The process in this block is triggered on the falling edge (negedge) of the 20th bit of the 'dqs_in' signal. Upon this event, it calls the dqs_pos_timing_check function with '20' as an input, presumably to perform timing analysis or error checking for this particular part of the signal.
